-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Generates HTML for Data.Tree as TreeMap
--   
--   Generates HTML for Data.Tree as TreeMap which is possible explore
--   directly in browser because of small javascript code included. Each
--   node is displayed as white box without any nested boxes inside.
@package treemap-html
@version 0.1

module Text.HTML.TreeList
treeList :: Tree String -> String

module Text.HTML.TreeUtils
mkHTMLBox :: String -> Int -> [Html] -> Int -> BoxProps -> Html
data BoxProps
BoxProps :: String -> String -> Int -> BoxProps
boxFillColor :: BoxProps -> String
boxBorderColor :: BoxProps -> String
boxBorderWidth :: BoxProps -> Int
defBoxProps :: BoxProps
displayBoxJS :: Html
tree2ltree :: Tree a -> Tree (Int, a)
instance Show BoxProps

module Text.HTML.TreeMap
treeMapExt :: TreeMapOptions -> Tree String -> String
treeMap :: Tree String -> String
defaultTreeOpts :: TreeMapOptions
data TreeMapOptions
TreeMapOptions :: String -> [String] -> TreeMapOptions
toLeafColor :: TreeMapOptions -> String
toAltColors :: TreeMapOptions -> [String]
instance Ord TableBox
instance Eq TableBox
instance Show TableBox
instance Ord Box
instance Eq Box
instance Show Box
